episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of intriguing topics, including a Kickstarter project to send a podcast episode to the moon, geologists creating earthquakes by dropping heavy objects, the history of men-only flights in America, and the announcement of the Higgs Boson discovery in Comic Sans font.

facts.fact: This episode of No Such Thing As A Fish is going to the moon.
Geologists have made an earthquake by dropping something heavy from somewhere high.
Until 1970, you could still buy men-only flights in America.
The discovery of the Higgs Boson was announced in Comic Sans.
